name: Mosaic: BlipBlop
storyline:
What are you waiting for? You deserve to become a Blopillionaire. Blipping has never been so fun. Every Blop counts and there’s trillions of Blops out there. Blip them all!

BlipBlop is provided by the leading tech company Mosaic. Learn more about our great tech, great people, and great visions at www.MosaicCorp.biz.
summary: BlipBlop provides endless of hours of entertainment, it’s simple and accessible, enjoyable for everyone, and it’s completely free! This is the next evolution for players who like tapping and clicker games.

videos.name: Trailer
